text: Personal information and privacy protection policies for self -conscious network
Updated: [August 4, 2022]
Effective time: [August 4, 2022]
The self -confidence network has always promised to protect the personal information and privacy of users who use the products or services provided by the self -conscious network.

In order to better protect your legitimate rights and interests, we have specially formulated this "Self -Online Personal Information and Privacy Protection Policy" to explain to you that when you are using our products or services (including your interaction with your own network andWhen you register as a user and/or the product that uses the self -conscious network, when you are collectively referred to as the "service"), we will correspondEarth guarantees your rights and interests.

"Personal Information and Privacy Protection Policy for Self -conscious Networks" (hereinafter referred to as "Privacy Policy" ") and you (hereinafter referred toThe Internet "or" us ", our registered address is: Room 1501G-3, Guobin Road, Yangpu District, Shanghai). This" Privacy Policy "has a contract effect.

text: 4. Safety reminder

(1) Please understand that due to the technical restrictions and the various malicious means that may exist, even if we have tried to strengthen security measures, we cannot always ensure that the information is 100 % security.
You need to understand that the systems and communication networks you use to access our services may be due to factors outside of our controllable scope.
(2) Please be sure to keep your account, password and other identity elements properly.
When you use the services we provide, we will identify your identity through your account, password and other identity elements.
Once you leak the aforementioned information, you may suffer losses and may be unfavorable to you.
If you find that accounts, passwords and/or other identity elements may be leaked, please contact us immediately so that we can take corresponding measures in time to avoid or reduce related losses.
